title: Theoretical Astrophysics
description: Theoretical investigation of astrophysical objects and processes, with an emphasis on the interstellar medium, extragalactic astrophysics, gas dynamics, and radiative transfer, and radiation processes.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PHYS 2213 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 3021 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
